definition[0]: something additional that is produced during a natural or industrial process
definition[1]: an unplanned additional result of something that you do
example[1]: Job losses are an unfortunate byproduct of the recession.
definition[2]: something produced during the process of making something else, especially during an industrial process
example[2]: Bran is a byproduct of the milling process.
definition[3]: something unexpected or unplanned that happens as a result of something else happening
example[3]: The fiscal crisis is a byproduct of the recession.
